game_odds.name: game_odds_odds_type_check
game_odds.definition: ((odds_type)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['moneyline_home'::character varying, 'moneyline_away'::character varying, 'spread_home'::character varying, 'spread_away'::character varying, 'over_under'::character varying])::text[]))

bet_selections.name: chk_bet_selections_moneyline
bet_selections.definition: (((spread_value IS NULL) AND (over_under_value IS NULL) AND (is_over IS NULL)) OR ((over_under_value IS NULL) AND (is_over IS NULL)) OR ((selected_team_id IS NULL) AND (spread_value IS NULL)))
